biotools.summary: Plugin for the PyMOL molecular visualization system that is specifically designed to visualize protein-DNA interfaces in three dimensions. PDIviz detects the interface of protein-DNA complexes by calculating the buried surface area directly in PyMOL.

bioschemas.name: PDIviz
bioschemas.summary: Plugin for the PyMOL molecular visualization system that is specifically designed to visualize protein-DNA interfaces in three dimensions. PDIviz detects the interface of protein-DNA complexes by calculating the buried surface area directly in PyMOL.
